class="o-teaser-collection__heading">\n         <a data-trackable="section-title" href="/comment">\n          Opinion\n         </a>\n        </h2>\n        <div class="o-grid-row">\n         <div              </li>\n                </ul>\n               </dd>\n              </dl>\n              <div class="card__myft-meta">\n               <div class="o-grid-row o-grid-row--compact">\n <script>\n     (function(){\n\tvar kpdata = window.kruxProgrammeData;\n\t\n\tif(kpdata){\n\t\tvar kpdata_length = kpdata.length;\n\t\tvar scrape_obj = {};\n\n\t\tif(kpdata_length &gt; 0){\n\t\t\tvar
